# Node.js dependencies
/node_modules
/.pnp
.pnp.js

# Testing coverage
/coverage

# Build output
/build
/dist

# Miscellaneous files
.DS_Store
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Frontend-specific
/frontend/node_modules
/frontend/.pnp
/frontend.pnp.js
/frontend/build
/frontend/.env*

# Backend-specific (if it's a Node.js backend, for example)
/backend/node_modules
/backend/.env*
/backend/build
/backend/dist

# IDE/editor settings
/.idea
.vscode

# OS-generated files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
